mapper.select: SELECT MSG.FROM_USER_ID AS fromUserId, FROM_USER.FROM_USER_NAME AS fromUser, IF( LENGTH(MSG.MESSAGE) <= 20, MSG.MESSAGE, CONCAT( LEFT(MSG.MESSAGE, 20) ,'...' ) ) AS message, MSG.MESSAGE_IMG AS messageImg, MSG.SENT_AVF AS sentAvf, MSG.TO_USER_ID AS toUserId, TO_USER.TO_USER_NAME AS toUser, TO_USER.TO_USER_ICON AS toUserIcon FROM MESSAGE_HIST MSG INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID, NAME AS FROM_USER_NAME, AVF FROM USERS WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() ) AS FROM_USER ON FROM_USER.ID = MSG.FROM_USER_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID, NAME AS TO_USER_NAME, PROFILE_IMG AS TO_USER_ICON FROM USERS WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() ) AS TO_USER ON TO_USER.ID = MSG.TO_USER_ID WHERE MSG.FROM_USER_ID = #{userId} AND MSG.SENT_AVF >= FROM_USER.AVF AND MSG.SENT_AVF IN ( SELECT MAX(SENT_AVF) FROM MESSAGE_HIST GROUP BY TO_USER_ID ) ORDER BY MSG.SENT_AVF DESC

SELECT MSG.FROM_USER_ID AS fromUserId, FROM_USER.FROM_USER_NAME AS fromUser, FROM_USER.FROM_USER_ICON AS fromUserIcon, MSG.MESSAGE AS message, MSG.MESSAGE_IMG AS messageImg, MSG.SENT_AVF AS sentAvf, MSG.TO_USER_ID AS toUserId, TO_USER.TO_USER_NAME AS toUser, TO_USER.TO_USER_ICON AS toUserIcon FROM MESSAGE_HIST MSG INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID, NAME AS FROM_USER_NAME, AVF, PROFILE_IMG AS FROM_USER_ICON FROM USERS WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() ) AS FROM_USER ON FROM_USER.ID = MSG.FROM_USER_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID, NAME AS TO_USER_NAME, PROFILE_IMG AS TO_USER_ICON FROM USERS WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() ) AS TO_USER ON TO_USER.ID = MSG.TO_USER_ID WHERE MSG.SENT_AVF >= FROM_USER.AVF AND ( MSG.FROM_USER_ID = #{fromUserId} AND MSG.TO_USER_ID = #{toUserId} ) OR ( MSG.FROM_USER_ID = #{toUserId} AND MSG.TO_USER_ID = #{fromUserId} ) ORDER BY MSG.SENT_AVF
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE_HIST( FROM_USER_ID, MESSAGE, MESSAGE_IMG, SENT_AVF, TO_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{msgInfo.fromUserId}, #{msgInfo.content}, #{msgInfo.messageImg.encodedString}, #{msgInfo.sentAvf}, #{msgInfo.toUserId} )

DELETE FROM MESSAGE_HIST MSG WHERE FROM_USER_ID = #{msgInfo.fromUserId}, AND SENT_AVF = #{msgInfo.sentAvf}, AND TO_USER_ID = #{msgInfo.toUserId}, AND MSG.SENT_AVF >= ( SELECT AVF FROM USERS U WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > U.AVF AND U.ID = MSG.FROM_USER_ID )

DELETE FROM MESSAGE_HIST MSG WHERE ( FROM_USER_ID = #{fromUserId} AND TO_USER_ID = #{toUserId} ) OR ( FROM_USER_ID = #{toUserId} AND TO_USER_ID = #{fromUserId} ) AND MSG.SENT_AVF >= ( SELECT AVF FROM USERS U WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > U.AVF AND U.ID = MSG.FROM_USER_ID )
